content.description: Some unique and fun movement with potential for an unpleasant  fall.Start matched on the horn and get your feet high over your head, jamming your right foot in the crack. Bring your right hand up to the edge by your right foot, then do some funky movement to get a left heel hook on the horn, bring your right foot down below the lip, work your left hand up the arête, and top out. The block below the roof when you start is off.There's about a 5 foot drop from the ledge you start on, which has a tree on it as well, so if you fall there's a chance you'll hit the tree and also fall from the ledge to the ground, so if you're gonna climb this I'd recommend having it well protected or just not falling.
content.protection: 2-4 pads, a spotter or two, or just dont fall lol
content.location: Off to the right of the snake hole, the distinct crack feature with a tree just right of it on the ledge.

content.description: Start inside the left corner of the cave on a good horizontal. Climb out of the cave to the right via mail slots and  establish yourself on the face. Traverse left on low crimps and finish up the same as 62% Chance of Gorbachev.

Start inside the left corner of the cave on a good horizontal. Climb out of the cave to the left via a slot and the edge of the roof to set yourself for a big reach to a good ledge in the middle of the roof. Then find your way to reach the the face and go up decent crimp and slots to top out (same as Water Weight)
content.protection: 2 Pads min. Especially for the top out. Thin pad recommended to avoid dabs on the roof section.

content.description: Start inside the left corner of the cave ona good horizontal. Climb out of the cave to the right via mail slots and establish yourself on the face. Top out straight up.

Starts on a big horn with both feet out right. Traverse to the left, just above the ground, and then head up to an easy topout. The crux is getting up on the face from underneath. The big boulder to the left is off.
content.location: Find lucky lizard with the obvious little cave inside. This climb is not in that cave. This climb is on the boulder to the right of that one. Find a chalked up shelf/horn thing about 2-3 feet off the ground and start there.

content.description: Start in the left of the cave on the pillar. Work your way up and right around the rounded corner to a slopey topout. Wall to the left is off.
A nice outcropping that hosts a huge shelf and a small cave.
